tool.name: Reverse-Complement
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool reverse-complements each sequence in a library. If the library is a FASTQ, the quality-scores are also reversed.
--------
**Example**
Input FASTQ file::
@CSHL_1_FC42AGWWWXX:8:1:3:740 TGTCTGTAGCCTCNTCCTTGTAATTCAAAGNNGGTA +CSHL_1_FC42AGWWWXX:8:1:3:740 33 33 33 34 33 33 33 33 33 33 33 33 27 5 27 33 33 33 33 33 33 27 21 27 33 32 31 29 26 24 5 5 15 17 27 26
Output FASTQ file::
@CSHL_1_FC42AGWWWXX:8:1:3:740 TACCNNCTTTGAATTACAAGGANGAGGCTACAGACA +CSHL_1_FC42AGWWWXX:8:1:3:740 26 27 17 15 5 5 24 26 29 31 32 33 27 21 27 33 33 33 33 33 33 27 5 27 33 33 33 33 33 33 33 33 34 33 33 33
